Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Super House International in Beijing (South Chaoyang), you'll be minutes from Beijing Curio City and close to Hongqiao Market. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Panjiayuan Antique Market and Beijing University of Technology Gymnasium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 279 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as a fitness center, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and gift shops/newsstands. Additional amenities include shopping on site and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Event facilities at this hotel consist of conference space and meeting rooms. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at noon Check-out time is 12:30 PM
Enjoy a meal at one of the hotel's dining establishments, which include 2 restaurants and a coffee shop/café. From your room, you can also access 24-hour room service.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Super House International in Beijing (South Chaoyang), you'll be minutes from Beijing Curio City and close to Hongqiao Market. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Panjiayuan Antique Market and Beijing University of Technology Gymnasium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Beijing Curio City - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Panjiayuan Antique Market - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Beijing University of Technology Gymnasium - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Longtan Park - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Beijing Yansha Outlets - 2.8 km / 1.7 mi
Happy Valley Amusement Park - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Beijing International Tennis Center - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Today Art Museum - 3.8 km / 2.3 mi
Hongqiao Market - 4.1 km / 2.5 mi
Tiantan Park - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Echo Wall - 4.3 km / 2.6 mi
Temple of Heaven - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Yintai Centre - 4.8 km / 3 mi
China World Trade Center - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Silk Street Market - 4.8 km / 3 mi

The preferred airport for Super House International is Beijing (PEK-Capital Intl.) - 26.3 km / 16.4 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
